content: fable socks fake cable by cissy tang @dotcardigan fall 2023 materials 100g fingering weight sock yarn sample knit in isager sock yarn #22 2 00mm needles your preferred needle type for cuff 2 25mm needles your preferred needle type for main stitch markers if desired tapestry needle for weaving in ends gauge 32 stitches per 4 inches after blocking note on sizing chart and written pattern are created for a 64-stitch sock only you may size up or down your needles to create a bigger or smaller sock alternative you may add or subtract an extra purl stitch for each purl column in the pattern this would result in a 18 stitch repeat 72 stitch sock or 14 stitch repeat 56 stitch sock respectively you must adjust cast-on ribbing heel flap gusset and toes instructions appropriately to match your personal stitch count please note that the 2x2 ribbing will not flow continuously into the faux cables if you adjust your stitch count abbreviations k knit p purl ssk slip slip knit k2tog
